name: T. Catherine Mercy
summary: Experienced finance professional with 9 years in BPO finance, strong analytical and communication skills, seeking to contribute financial expertise and leadership to drive business success.

experience.title: Finance Analyst
experience.description: Coordinated with onshore business to review AUC balances and update WBSE status; scheduled monthly calls with onshore teams and Finance/Business leads; led team meetings; served as single point of contact for ad hoc requests and statutory reporting; contributed to Capex/Asset capitalization and close processes, including audit responses and internal control activities.

experience.title: Process Associate
experience.description: Handled asset capitalization, transfer, disposal, cost adjustment and CIP account reconciliation; performed asset depreciation; managed AP payments and corresponding JEs; verified backup records; reclassified assets as expenses when required; managed inter-branch asset transfers and disposals; performed depreciation reconciliation; recognized as top performer with multiple client awards.

experience.title: Process Associate
experience.description: Involved in MI consolidation and MI audit; resolved queries; cross-skilled across processes; trained new team members; completed Lean Training; achieved high-quality output and productivity; involved in knowledge sharing and process improvement initiatives.
